TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiView extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 表示作为一组 控件的容器的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一组控件的容器。 The control is a container for a group of controls. 它允许您定义一组控件, 其中每个控件都包含子控件。It allows you to define a group of controls, where each control contains child controls. 然后, 应用程序可以根据条件 (如用户标识、用户首选项以及在查询字符串参数中传递的信息) 将特定控件呈现给客户端。Your application can then render a specific control to the client based on criteria such as user identity, user preferences, and information passed in a query-string parameter. 你还可以使用控件创建向导。You can also use the control to create wizards. 在此方案中, 控件中包含的每个控件都表示向导中的不同步骤或页面。In this scenario, each control contained in a control represents a different step or page in the wizard. 还应使用此控件来开发用于移动设备的多屏幕应用程序。You should also use this control to develop multiple-screen applications for mobile devices. 此控件提供与 .NET Framework 版本1.1 中的 ASP.NET 移动控件相同的功能。This control provides the same functionality as the ASP.NET mobile control in .NET Framework version 1.1. 一次只能将一个控件定义为控件内的活动视图。Only one control at a time can be defined as the active view within a control. 当控件定义为活动视图时, 它包含的子控件将呈现到客户端。When a control is defined as the active view, the child controls that it contains are rendered to the client. 您可以使用属性或方法来定义活动视图。You can use either the property or the method to define the active view. 如果该属性为空, 则该控件不会向客户端呈现任何内容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 如果活动视图设置为在控件中不存在的, 则会在运行时引发。If the active view is set to a that does not exist within the control, an is raised at run time. 您可以以声明方式或编程方式定义活动视图。You can define the active view declaratively or programmatically. 定义控件时以声明方式设置该属性将导致第一次调用该控件时, 将设置为活动视图的控件呈现给客户端。 Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property declaratively. ``` ``` 以编程方式设置 属性或调用方法, 允许应用程序根据诸如用户标识或首选项之类的条件, 确定要在运行时向客户端呈现哪个控件。 Setting the property programmatically, or calling the method, allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or preferences. 若要允许用户在控件内的控件之间导航 , 可以向每个 控件添加或控件。To allow users to navigate between controls within a control, you can add a or control to each control. 若要利用控件对当前活动的自动更新, 请将按钮或链接`CommandName`按钮上的属性设置为与所需的以下命令名称字段之一对应的值:导航行为: 、 、 或。 To take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the currently active , set the `CommandName` property on the button or link button to the value of one of the following command-name fields that corresponds to the desired navigation behavior: , , , or . ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                         ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 当用户在任何页面上单击 "**上一步**" 按钮时, 该属性将递减以导航到上一个控件。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 当用户在任何页面上单击 "**下一步**" 按钮时, 该属性将递增以导航到下一个控件。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含三个 控件的基本控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a basic control that contains three controls. 用户从列表框中选择的视图将设置为活动视图并显示给用户。The view that the user selects from the list box is set to the active view and displayed to the user. 有关控件的更详细示例, 请参阅本主题中提供的其他代码示例。For a more detailed example of the control, see the other code examples provided in this topic. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example 2/VB/multiviewclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含三个控件的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 控件没有任何样式属性。A control does not have any style properties. 因此, 每个控件都包含一个允许在控件上设置样式的控件。Therefore, each control contains a control to allow styles to be set on the control. 第一次加载页面时, `DefaultView`将使用方法设置为活动视图。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每个控件都包含链接按钮, 以允许用户导航到不同的视图。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ActiveViewChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件的活动 控件在两次服务器发送间发生更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the active control of a control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件中的活动控件在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时, 将引发事件。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件的事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 当活动视图发生更改时, 页面上的控件中将显示一条消息。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

member this.ActiveViewIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的活动 控件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 控件的活动 控件的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示没有任何视图设置为活动视图。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that no view is set as active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将控件中的控件设置为活动视图。 Use the property to set a control within a control as the active view. 你还可以使用此属性返回当前设置为活动视图的控件的索引。You can also use this property to return the index of the control that is currently set as the active view. 控件的索引由在控件内声明控件的顺序确定。The index of a control is determined by the order in which it is declared within a control. 例如, 在控件中声明的第一个控件的索引为0。For example, the first control declared within a control has an index of 0. 一次只能将一个控件定义为在控件内处于活动状态。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 设置为属性的控件将呈现给客户端。 The control that is set to the property will be rendered to the client. 如果该属性设置为在控件中不存在的, 将在运行时引发。If the property is set to a that does not exist within the control, a is raised at run time. 如果该属性为空, 则该控件不会向客户端呈现任何内容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 可以在开发时以声明方式或在运行时以编程方式设置属性。You can set the property either declaratively at development time or programmatically at run time. 定义控件时以声明方式设置该属性将导致第一次调用该控件时, 将设置为活动视图的控件呈现给客户端。 Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 通过以编程方式设置 属性,应用程序可以根据诸如用户身份或其首选项之类的条件,确定要在运行时向客户端呈现哪个控件。Setting the property programmatically allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or their preferences. 或者, 可以使用和方法设置或获取控件中的活动视图。Alternately, you can use the and methods to set or get the active view within the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 当用户在任何页面上单击 "**上一步**" 按钮时, 该属性将递减以导航到上一个控件。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 当用户在任何页面上单击 "**下一步**" 按钮时, 该属性将递增以导航到下一个控件。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的索引设置为小于 -1，或大于等于列表项的数目。

span.span: The specified index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list.

member this.EnableTheming : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否向 控件应用主题。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to the control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if themes are to be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为控件启用主题。 The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 属性还会影响是否为其集合中包含的控件启用主题。 The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 当属性为`true`时, 将在应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。 When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果主题目录中不存在特定控件的外观, 则不会应用外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 当属性为`false`时, 不会搜索主题目录 , 也不会使用属性的内容。 When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控件可以重写其父控件或包含页设置的值。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 例如 , 如果控件已设置为`false`, 则可以通过将属性设置为 `true`来有选择地将主题应用于控件中包含的各个控件在单独的子控件上。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to individual controls contained within the control by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.View GetActiveView() cil managed

summary.span: 返回 控件的当前活动 控件。

span.span: Returns the current active control within a control.

returns.span: 控件，表示 控件的活动视图。

span.span: A control that represents the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可返回当前设置为活动视图的控件中的控件。Use this method to return the control within a control that is currently set as the active view. 此方法返回一个控件, 因此可用于访问活动视图的属性。This method returns a control and therefore can be used to access the properties of the active view. 例如, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID`返回 MultiView1 中当前活动视图的属性的值。For example, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID` returns the value of the property of the current active view in MultiView1. 或者, 可以使用属性来获取或设置控件中当前活动视图的从零开始的索引。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 此属性可通过声明方式或编程方式访问。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建包含三个控件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 引发事件时 , 使用方法返回当前活动视图, 并将其显示在页面上的控件中。 When the event is raised, the method is used to return the current active view and display it in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 属性未设置为 控件中的有效 控件。

span.span: The property is not set to a valid control within the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly NextViewCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示要显示在 控件中、与下一个 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the next control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "NextView" 命令名称。Use the field to represent the "NextView" command name. 您可以使用此字段的值来利用控件对活动控件的自动更新。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如 , 如果控件 包含定位到上一个的控件, 则可以将属性设置为该字段的值, 即 "NextView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the previous , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "NextView". 这将导致控件在单击按钮时自动减小属性的值。This causes the control to automatically decrement the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供调查中上一个和下一个控件之间的自动导航。 The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnActiveViewChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnActiveViewChanged (e As EventArgs)
abstract member OnActiveViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnActiveViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件中的活动控件在向服务器的各次发送之间更改时, 将引发该事件, 您可以为此事件提供自定义处理程序。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server, and you can provide a custom handler for this event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)中使用事件。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件的事件指定和编写事件处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 当活动视图发生更改时, 页面上的控件中将显示一条消息。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 确定 控件的事件是否传递给页的用户界面服务器控件层次结构。

span.span: Determines whether the event for the control is passed to the page's UI server control hierarchy.

returns.span: 如果事件已被取消，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event has been canceled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件包含引发事件的控件。A control contains controls that raise events. 此方法重写基实现以处理控件之间的导航。This method overrides the base implementation to handle navigation between controls.

exception.span: 控件无法找到 的 属性中指定的 。

span.span: The control cannot find the specified in the property of .

exception.span: 无法将 的 属性作为整数进行分析。

span.span: The property of cannot be parsed as an integer.

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 对象。

span.span: An object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过此方法通知时, 控件必须执行创建和设置实例所需的任何初始化步骤。When notified by this method, a control must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在服务器控件生命周期的此阶段中, 尚未填充控件的视图状态。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 如果调用此方法, 则不能访问另一个服务器控件, 即使它是此控件的子级或父级。You cannot access another server control when this method is called, even if it is a child or parent of this control. 不一定要创建其他服务器控件并准备好进行访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly PreviousViewCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示要显示在 控件中、与上一个 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the previous control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "PrevView" 命令名称。Use the field to represent the "PrevView" command name. 您可以使用此字段的值来利用控件对活动控件的自动更新。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如 , 如果控件 包含导航到下一个的控件, 则可以将属性设置为该字段的值, 即 "PrevView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the next , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "PrevView". 这将导致控件在单击按钮时自动递增属性的值。This causes the control to automatically increment the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供调查中上一个和下一个控件之间的自动导航。 The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Called after a control is removed from the collection of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从控件的 集合中移除控件后, 立即调用方法。 The method is called immediately after a control is removed from the collection of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

param.name: writer
param.span: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 。

span.span: An that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.

summary.span: 将 控件内容写入指定的 对象，以便在客户端显示。

span.span: Writes the control content to the specified object, for display on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从控件派生自定义类时, 此方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 方法使用提供的将活动视图的呈现内容写入客户端。 The method writes the rendered content of the active view to the client using the supplied . 您可以 使用方法或属性在控件中设置活动视图。You can set the active view in a control using the method or the property. 您可以通过 使用方法或属性,确定集合中的哪个控件是活动视图(如果有)。You can determine which one of the controls in the collection is the active view, if any, by using the method or the property. 如果为控件设置了活动视图, 则使用活动控件呈现该视图及其子控件的内容。If an active view is set for the control, the active control is used to render content for that view and its child controls. 如果没有为控件设置活动视图, 则不会向中呈现任何内容。If an active view is not set for the control, no content is rendered to the .

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

span.span: Saves the current state of the control.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示 控件的状态。

span.span: An that represents the state of the control.

returns.span: 如果 控件没有任何关联视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns .

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetActiveView(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.View view) cil managed

param.name: view
param.span: 控件中要设置为活动视图的 控件。

span.span: A control to set as the active view within a control.

summary.span: 将指定的 控件设置为 控件的活动视图。

span.span: Sets the specified control to the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以将 控件中的控件设置为活动视图。Use this method to set a control within a control as the active view. 一次只能将一个控件定义为在控件内处于活动状态。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 设置为活动视图的控件呈现给客户端。The control that is set as the active view is rendered to the client. 如果控件中不存在的控件被设置为活动,则在运行时将引发异常。 If a control that does not exist within the control is set as active, an exception is raised at run time. 如果未将控件设置为活动视图, 则控件不会向客户端呈现任何内容。If no control is set as the active view, the control does not render any content to the client. 通过使用方法以编程方式设置活动视图, 应用程序可以根据条件 (如用户的标识和首选项) 确定要在运行时向客户端呈现的控件。 Using the method to programmatically set the active view allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity and preferences. 或者, 可以使用属性来获取或设置控件中当前活动视图的从零开始的索引。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 此属性可通过声明方式或编程方式访问。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建包含三个控件的控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 第一次加载页面时, `DefaultView`将使用方法设置为活动视图。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每个控件都包含链接按钮, 以允许用户导航到不同的视图。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 参数值未包含在 控件中。

span.span: The specified parameter value was not contained in the control.

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewByIDCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示一个命令名，该命令名与根据指定的 ID 更改 控件中的活动 控件关联。此字段为只读。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with changing the active control in a control, based on a specified id. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "SwitchViewByID" 命令名称。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByID" command name. 您可以使用此字段的值来利用控件对活动控件的自动更新。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如, 如果控件包含一个 在单击时导航到第一个控件的控件, 则可以将该属性设置为 "SwitchViewByID" 字段的值。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByID". 将属性设置为控件中第一个的 ID, 如 "Page1"。 Set the property to the ID of the first in the control, such as "Page1". 这会使控件在单击按钮时自动将 "Page1" 设置为活动状态。This causes the control to automatically set "Page1" as the active when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供调查中上一个和下一个控件之间的自动导航。 The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果用户在调查中单击 "重**修调查**" 按钮, 该字段将与 "Page1" 的命令参数一起使用, 以将用户重定向回调查的第一个 。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of "Page1" to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

related.span: 查看和查看 Web 服务器控件概述

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewByIndexCommandName As String

summary.span: 表示命令名，该命令名与更改 控件的活动 控件关联，这种更改是根据指定的 索引进行的。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with changing the active control in a control based on a specified index.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段表示 "SwitchViewByIndex" 命令名称。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByIndex" command name. 您可以使用此字段的值来利用控件对活动控件的自动更新。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如, 如果控件包含一个 在单击时导航到第一个控件的控件, 则可以将该属性设置为 "SwitchViewByIndex" 字段的值。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByIndex". 将属性设置为控件中第一个的索引, 该索引为0。 Set the property to the index of the first in the control, which is 0. 这将导致控件在单击按钮时自动将该属性设置为0。This causes the control to automatically set the property to 0 when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建基本调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件都是单独的调查问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供调查中上一个和下一个控件之间的自动导航。 The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果用户在调查中单击 "重**修调查**" 按钮, 该字段将与命令参数0一起使用, 以将用户重定向回调查的第一个 。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of 0 to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName/CS/multiview.switchviewbyindexcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.SwitchViewByIndexCommandName/VB/multiview.switchviewbyindexcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Views As ViewCollection

summary.span: 获取 控件的 控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of controls in the control.

value.span: ，表示 控件的 控件的集合。

span.span: A that represents a collection of controls within a control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式管理 控件中的控件。Use this property to programmatically manage the controls in a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式将控件添加到控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add controls to a control. 创建每个控件后, 该`MultiView.Views.Add()`语法用于将控件添加到控件的集合。After each control is created, the `MultiView.Views.Add()` syntax is used to add the control to the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型, 如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中, 则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息, 请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.Views Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.Views Example/VB/multiviewviewsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: MultiView and View Web Server Controls Overview
